ComicInfo.Series: The Deadly Hands of Kung Fu
ComicInfo.Title: Between Two Hates; Sword of Vengeance
ComicInfo.Summary: Vachon gets Colleen addicted to heroin. Misty gives them a chance for escape, but Colleen induces a rapid, but painful, withdrawal to try to clean the heroin from her system. Misty takes out all of Vachon's minions and defeats Chung. She is taken down by Vachon but Colleen intervenes just in time to save Misty's life. Misty kills Chung and Colleen avenges her grandfather by killing Vachon in battle. Colleen finds that the heroin is completely out of her system and Misty believes that the mind-meld with Iron Fist must be behind it.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 17:12:10. [Issue ID 30753]
ComicInfo.Writer: Chris Claremont,Doug Moench,John Warner,Doug Moench,Chris Claremont
ComicInfo.Letterer: Irving Watanabe,Karen Mantlo,Rudy Nebres,Marshall Rogers,Rudy Nebres,Irving Watanabe,Marshall Rogers,Karen Mantlo
